Key Match Events: Pakistan rallied behind spectacular half-centuries from Iftikhar Ahmed and Shadab Khan to post 185 for nine
Shaheen Afridi claimed two early wickets and Shadab removed Temba Bavuma and Aiden Markram, who had built a promising third-wicket partnership of 49
Miscellaneous Highlights: The skies opened soon afterwards with South Africa on 69-4 after nine overs and an hour later they resumed with a revised target of 142 from five more overs under the Duckworth–Lewis–Stern method
Others: Pakistan kept alive their slim hopes of reaching the T20 World Cup semi-finals
South Africa remain in second place behind India in Group 2 despite the loss
